DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect steady-state telotristat ethyl pharmacokinetics ( PK ) single-dose fexofenadine healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Drug-Drug Interaction Study Telotristat Etiprate Fexofenadine Healthy Subjects
